header.content: Saves a package from the workspace to the filesystem.

value.name: repo
value.description: The repository of the package destination.

value.name: dir
value.description: The directory of the package destination.

value.name: file
value.description: The file name of the package destination.

value.name: path
value.description: The path of the package destination in 2 space delimited parts.

value.name: uri
value.description: The path of the package destination in uri format in one part.
